title: Zipp Tangente Course gravel tires rebrand as new G40 XPLR
content:
Zipp has some new gravel tires to check out. Only, they’re not quite new – except for the logo. Originally called the Tangente Course G40, Zipp’s gravel tires join their gravel-oriented handlebars in XPLR family. Other than the XPLR G40 name, these are the same tires that Tyler checked out early last year. Offered in […]

The post Zipp Tangente Course gravel tires rebrand as new G40 XPLR appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
